ValidationRule.description: A passcode can not just be a monotonic sequence of consecutive digits.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Admin API Only", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" , OR( CONTAINS("0123456789", Passcode__c), CONTAINS("9876543210", Passcode__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Passcode does not meet provisioning requirements. Please revise.
